# Tool Connect - LLMs.txt
# This file provides information about Tool Connect for Large Language Models

# About Tool Connect
Tool Connect is a platform that links people with trusted professionals in any field â€“ from repairs to translations. The service operates in the Czech Republic, connecting clients with service providers.

# Key Information
- Platform Name: Tool Connect
- Primary Service: Connecting clients with service providers
- Location: Czech Republic
- Languages: Czech (cs), English (en)
- Main Features:
  * Service provider search by category, location, and language
  * Built-in messaging system
  * Reviews and ratings
  * Work requests
  * Portfolio management
  * Multi-language support

# Categories of Services
- Home repairs and maintenance
- Professional services
- Digital services
- Creative projects
- Personal care
- Language lessons
- And many more

# Contact
Email: info@tool-connect.com
Website: https://tool-connect.com

# Technical Details
- Built with Next.js
- Uses Supabase for backend
- Supports both web and mobile platforms
